sqlMap.select: /* ConfigMstrDAO.selectCofigMstr */ SELECT AD_DS_VIEW_ID , ITEM_TBL_NM , ITEM_COL_NM ,dbo.F_DECRYPT( ITEM_EXCEPT_COL_NM ) as ITEM_EXCEPT_COL_NM , USER_TBL_NM , USER_COL_NM ,dbo.F_DECRYPT( USER_EXCEPT_COL_NM ) as USER_EXCEPT_COL_NM , ITEM_ALG , USER_ALG , TOS_EXEC , STATS_RNT_LIMIT , MANUAL_RNT_LIMIT FROM WP2_CONFIG_MSTR WHERE AD_DS_VIEW_ID = #AD_DS_VIEW_ID#
